posts.message:
This post will be for our productivity tools...
Every Geek kindly share one or more of your productivity secrets...
Let's start...

سرعة نقل الملفات من USB لـ HDD بطيئة جدااا اقل من 2MB/s و العكس نفس النظام لا يتعدي الـ4MB/s
الكلام دا علي Ubuntu Server 16.04
دروت علي الأنترنت معرفتش اوصل لحل ! البعض اقترح اني اعمل mount بbig_writes بس مفيش اي تأثير.

# USB
HPFS/NTFS/exFAT
---
/dev/sdd1 on /media/sdd1 type fuseblk (rw,relatime,user_id=0,group_id=0,allow_other,blksize=4096)

# HDD
Linux filesystem
---
/dev/sdb1 on /mnt/MediaVault type fuseblk (rw,relatime,user_id=0,group_id=0,allow_other,blksize=4096)

لو حد عندة اي فكرة ازاي احل المشكلة اكون شاكر جدا لية !
MY RESEARCH
http://askubuntu.com/questions/546896/performance-difference-ntfs-linux-and-ntfs-windows
http://superuser.com/questions/613869/ntfs-write-speed-really-slow-15mb-s-on-ubuntu
http://www.tuxera.com/community/ntfs-3g-faq/#slow

anyone with experience of displaying 360 photos in web apps, my app is built with angular2, n i'll probably need to build a custom component for that, so, right now, i'm just looking for the best library someone used before to display 360 photos in a web app n it didn't downgrade the overall performance of the page, i also need something lightweight..

في احد ال job posts فى شغل ل android developer 
Experience Needed:
More than 4 years
Salary:
4,000 to 6,000 EGP per month

هل السالاري دى كويس ل حد اربع سنين فيما فوق ؟
